AltText: Oak leaves and a red berry in a frozen puddle in Crofton Woods.
Title: Temporary exhibit
CaptionAbstract:
Frozen conditions are not common where I live in the London suburbs, and it's always a painful experience if I miss the photographic opportunities presented by sub-zero temperatures.

Thankfully, this cold snap was one I managed to capitalise on. This frozen puddle wouldn't have lasted much longer than a day or so after I took this photo.
